mapper.insert: insert into user(name, email, password, phone, hire_date, birthday, dept, position, distribution, date_created, date_updated, date_deleted, is_deleted, role, company_id) values (#{name}, #{email}, #{password}, #{phone}, null, #{birthday}, null, null, false, now(), now(), null, false, #{role}, #{companyId})
mapper.select: select exists(select * from user where email = #{email})
